item.title: 养老基金 AustralianSuper 退出软件公司 WiseTech Global
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的养老基金周三表示，由于物流软件巨头 WiseTech Global 公司内部的管理问题，AustralianSuper 已出售其所持股份。【原文：AustralianSuper has sold its stake in logistics software giant WiseTech Global because of governance issues within the firm, the country's largest pension fund said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 台湾在美国可能征收关税前捍卫贸易和货币纪录
item.description: 台湾中央银行周三在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）可能征收关税之前为台湾的贸易和货币记录进行了辩护，称高经常账户盈余是一个结构性问题，华盛顿对此表示理解。【原文：Taiwan's central bank on Wednesday defended the island's trade and currency record ahead of possible tariffs from U.S. President Donald Trump, saying the high current account surplus was a structural problem and Washington understood that.】

item.title: 早间竞标战战兢兢期待 4 月 2 日
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 消息人士称，星展集团在收购印尼巴宁银行控股权的竞争中处于领先地位
item.description: 三位知情人士称，东南亚资产规模最大的银行星展集团是收购印尼帕宁银行控股权的领跑者。【原文：DBS Group , Southeast Asia's top bank by assets, is the frontrunner to buy a controlling stake in Indonesia's Panin Bank , three people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 日本议员称日元被低估，希望采取措施扭转外流趋势
item.description: 在执政党考虑采取措施帮助扭转资本外流之际，资深议员告诉路透社，日本的经济基本面表明，日元的实际价值更接近于 1 美元兑 120-130 日元，而不是目前的 150 日元。【原文：Japan's economic fundamentals suggest the yen's real value is closer to 120-130 per dollar rather than the current 150 levels, senior lawmaker told Reuters, as the ruling party considers steps to help reverse capital outflows.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，美联储主席古尔斯比认为利率将在一年后降低，但警告称存在不确定性
item.description: 据《金融时报》周三发表的一篇采访报道，芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯坦-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，他预计利率将在 12-18 个月内 "适当降低"，但他补充说，由于经济的不确定性，下一次降息可能需要比预期更长的时间。【原文：Chicago Federal Reserve Bank President Austan Goolsbee said he expected interest rates to be "a fair bit lower" in 12-18 months but added that it may take longer than anticipated for the next cut to come because of economic uncertainty, according to a Financial Times interview published Wednesday.】

item.title: Anduril 称人工智能初创公司从特朗普新五角大楼看到了良好的 "氛围
item.description: Anduril 公司总裁克里斯蒂安-博斯（Christian Bose）说，这家人工智能驱动的防务初创公司的创始人因早年支持唐纳德-特朗普而离开了脸谱网。【原文：Anduril president Christian Bose said the AI-powered defence start-up, whose founder left Facebook over his early support of Donald Trump, has good "vibes" about the Trump administration's shakeup of defence and willingness to do things differently.】

item.title: 欧洲投资者表示，人工智能采用者实现目标的时间不多了
item.description: 在生成式人工智能领域投入巨资的欧洲公司需要在明年之前开始显示其巨额支出的回报，否则投资者就有可能在付出天价加入市场热潮后失去耐心。【原文：European companies that are spending big on generative artificial intelligence need to start showing returns on their massive outlays by next year, or risk investors losing patience after they paid sky-high prices to join the market boom.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，瑞银为斡旋瑞士资本妥协提出让步方案
item.description: 瑞士联合银行（UBS）收购瑞士信贷银行（Credit Suisse）以创建瑞士银行业巨头已有两年时间，熟悉相关讨论的人士称，该行正试图通过限制其投资银行的未来规模和持有更多资本来规避更严格的监管。【原文：Two years since it acquired Credit Suisse to create a Swiss banking giant, UBS is trying to head off tougher regulations by offering to limit the future size of its investment bank and hold more capital, people familiar with discussions said.】

item.title: 越南决定允许 SpaceX 的 Starlink 卫星提供互联网服务
item.description: 越南政府周三表示，它已做出决定，允许 SpaceX 在越南试发射 Starlink 卫星互联网服务。【原文：Vietnam's government said on Wednesday it had issued a decision to allow SpaceX to launch its Starlink satellite internet service on a trial basis in the country.】

item.title: 交易员思考特朗普关税前景，股市上涨，美元漂移
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市跟随华尔街走高，美元走势摇摆不定，因为市场在等待唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易政策在下周新一轮关税之前明朗化。【原文：Asian stocks followed Wall Street higher on Wednesday and the U.S. dollar meandered as markets awaited clarity on President Donald Trump's trade policy ahead of a new round of tariffs next week.】

item.title: 巴拿马未授权访问巴拿马科布雷铜矿
item.description: 巴拿马工商部在周二的一份声明中说，巴拿马没有批准对第一量子公司已关闭的巴拿马科布雷矿进行访问。【原文：Panama has not authorized visits to First Quantum's shuttered Cobre Panama mine, the country's Ministry of Commerce and Industry said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: Anthropic 在音乐出版商人工智能版权案中提前胜诉
item.description: 人工智能公司Anthropic周二说服了一名加州联邦法官，驳回了阻止该公司使用环球音乐集团（Universal Music Group）和其他音乐出版商拥有的歌词来训练其人工智能聊天机器人Claude的初步请求。【原文：Artificial intelligence company Anthropic convinced a California federal judge on Tuesday to reject a preliminary bid to block it from using lyrics owned by Universal Music Group and other music publishers to train its AI-powered chatbot Claude.】

item.title: 石油因供应紧张而走高
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁对从委内瑞拉进口石油和天然气的国家征收关税，以及美国原油库存降幅超过预期，市场担心供应趋紧，油价周三在亚洲早盘攀升。【原文：Oil prices climbed on Wednesday in early Asia trade on concerns of tighter supplies after U.S. President Donald Trump threatened tariffs against countries importing oil and gas from Venezuela and after U.S. crude inventories fell more than expected.】

item.title: 受关税影响，加拿大冻结向特斯拉支付退税，并禁止其参与未来的退税计划
item.description: 加拿大交通部长克里斯蒂娅-弗里兰（Chrystia Freeland）周二表示，加拿大已冻结对特斯拉的所有退税支付，并禁止这家电动汽车制造商参与未来的电动汽车退税计划。【原文：Canada has frozen all rebate payments for Tesla and banned the electric-vehicle maker from future EV rebate programs, Transport Minister Chrystia Freeland said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家消息：消息人士称ADM削减谷物贸易部门职位
item.description: 据三位知情人士透露，美国谷物商 Archer-Daniels-Midland 将于本周在其最大的部门--谷物贸易和油籽加工部门进行新一轮裁员。【原文：U.S. grains merchant Archer-Daniels-Midland is making a fresh wave of job cuts this week at its largest unit, the grain trading and oilseed processing division, according to three sources briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 2025 财年戴尔员工人数减少 10
item.description: 戴尔科技这家人工智能服务器制造商周二表示，2025 财年公司员工人数减少了 10%，并重申了对多元化和包容性的承诺。【原文：Dell Technologies headcount fell by 10% in fiscal 2025, and it reaffirmed its commitment to diversity and inclusion, the AI server maker said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 2024 年 ADM 首席执行官薪酬下降，因为公司面临会计问题和裁员问题
item.description: 据周二的一份证券文件显示，Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司首席执行官胡安-卢西亚诺 2024 年的薪酬为 2160 万美元，低于上一年的 2440 万美元，此前的会计问题和成本压力引发了裁员并导致股价暴跌。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co CEO Juan Luciano was paid $21.6 million in 2024, down from $24.4 million the prior year, according to a securities filing on Tuesday, and following accounting problems and cost pressures that have triggered layoffs and sent shares plummeting.】

item.title: 巴西 JBS 公司第四季度盈利 4.236 亿美元
item.description: 总部位于巴西的全球最大肉类包装公司 JBS 在 2024 年最后一个季度实现净利润 24.12 亿雷亚尔（约合 4.2357 亿美元），比去年同期的约 8,300 万雷亚尔大幅增长。【原文：Brazil-based JBS , the world's largest meat packer, posted a net profit of 2.412 billion reais ($423.57 million) in the final quarter of 2024, a significant increase from the around 83 million reais posted in the same period a year ago.】

item.title: 交易日：消费者再次投下不信任票
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 美国将数十家实体列入出口限制名单
item.description: 美国联邦公报》周二发布公告称，美国已将包括中国、伊朗和巴基斯坦在内的数十家实体列入出口限制名单。 根据该通知，这些实体，包括来自中国的 50 多个实体，被认定其行为违反了美国的国家安全或外交政策。【原文：The United States has added dozens of entities, including in China, Iran and Pakistan, to its export restriction list, according to a notice in the Federal Register on Tuesday. The entities, including over 50 from China, were found to be acting contrary to the national security or foreign policy of the U.S., according to the notice.】

item.title: 特朗普对委内瑞拉原油买家征收关税是美国施压的新利器
item.description: 分析人士说，美国计划对购买受制裁的委内瑞拉石油的国家征收关税，这标志着针对地缘政治敌人的惩罚性经济措施史无前例，而且可能具有强大的威力，华盛顿可能会对俄罗斯和伊朗等其他国家效仿这一做法。【原文：A U.S. plan to slap tariffs on countries buying sanctioned Venezuelan oil marks an unprecedented, and potentially potent, mixture of punitive economic measures against a geopolitical foe that Washington could replicate against other countries like Russia and Iran, analysts said.】

item.title: GameStop 董事会批准将比特币作为国库储备资产；报告利润上升
item.description: GameStop 周二表示，其董事会已一致批准将比特币作为一种国库储备资产，这使得其股价在延时交易中上涨了 6.2%。【原文：GameStop said on Tuesday that its board has unanimously approved the addition of bitcoin as a treasury reserve asset, sending its shares up 6.2% in extended trading.】

item.title: 埃利奥特起诉菲利普斯 66，要求下令提名四名董事会成员
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）周二表示，该公司已向特拉华州大法官法庭对炼油商菲利普斯 66 公司及其董事会提起诉讼，要求法院下达命令，要求在菲利普斯公司 2025 年度股东大会上对四个董事会席位进行选举。【原文：Elliott Investment Management said on Tuesday it had filed a lawsuit in the Court of Chancery of the State of Delaware against refiner Phillips 66 and its Board of Directors, seeking an order that would require four board seats to be up for election at Phillips' 2025 Annual Meeting of Shareholders.】

item.title: 墨西哥石油公司在特朗普关税威胁下寻求市场多元化
item.description: 墨西哥国家能源公司 Pemex 国际贸易部门 PMI 负责人周二表示，该公司正积极寻求汽车燃料进口和原油出口市场的多元化。【原文：Mexican state energy company Pemex is actively looking to diversify its market for both motor fuel imports and crude oil exports, the head of its international trading unit PMI said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国法官定于 6 月 23 日审理波音 737 MAX 欺诈案
item.description: 周二，美国一名法官将司法部起诉波音公司的刑事欺诈案的审判日期定在了6月23日，该案的起因是波音公司涉嫌就737 MAX飞机上的一个关键系统向美国监管机构作出虚假陈述。【原文：A U.S. judge on Tuesday set a June 23 trial date in the Justice Department's criminal fraud case against Boeing stemming from the planemaker's alleged misrepresentations to U.S. regulators about a key system on the 737 MAX.】

item.title: 瑞波实验室称与美国证券交易委员会达成和解，将少付 5000 万美元罚款
item.description: 瑞波实验室（Ripple Labs）首席法务官周二表示，该加密货币公司同意就美国证券交易委员会对其涉嫌销售未注册证券提起的民事诉讼达成和解，并在此前被处以的 1.25 亿美元罚款中仅支付 5000 万美元。【原文：Ripple Labs agreed to settle a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission civil lawsuit over the alleged sale of unregistered securities and pay just $50 million of a previously imposed $125 million fine, the cryptocurrency company's chief legal officer said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普表示希望终止对 NPR 和 PBS 的资助
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周二表示，他希望看到联邦政府停止向新闻机构 NPR 和 PBS 提供资金。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he would love to see federal funding end for news outlets NPR and PBS.】

item.title: 特朗普签署针对詹纳-布洛克律师事务所的行政命令
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统周二签署了一项行政命令，对詹纳-布洛克（Jenner & Block）律师事务所采取行动，白宫官员称该公司的行为是将政府和法律系统武器化。【原文：President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Tuesday that takes action against the law firm Jenner & Block, for what a White House official described as the company's actions to weaponize the government and legal system.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易负责人会见特朗普官员，试图阻止 "有害 "关税
item.description: 欧盟贸易委员马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）周二将与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的高级贸易官员会面，试图避免美国最早在下周对欧盟商品征收高额关税。【原文：The European Union's trade commissioner Maros Sefcovic was due to meet with U.S. President Donald Trump's top trade officials on Tuesday to try to avoid steep U.S. tariffs on EU goods as early as next week.】
